channel.title: How do I make it so people can spawn items on my server?
channel.description: Title really says it all lol :)

item.title: How do I make it so people can spawn items on my server?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

z4mor4k m1n1on:

ok go in client.java and search for “pickup” u shud see else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) now change the =2 to =1 and every1 shud be able to do pickup 0995 10 etc

Rofl

Search for

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2)

Change the 2 to 0

Search for

else if (command.startsWith("barrows") && playerRights >= 2)

Change it to 0
Etc.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it so people can spawn items on my server?

ok go in client.java and search for “pickup” u shud see else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) now change the =2 to =1 and every1 shud be able to do pickup 0995 10 etc

Dude… playerRights 1 is mod… Change 2 to 0. 0 is normal player
